org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.connectors.rss

Class RSSConnector.ThrottleSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.connectors.rss.RSSConnector.ThrottleSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IThrottleSpec
    Enclosing class:
    RSSConnector

    protected static class RSSConnector.ThrottleSpec
extends Object
implements IThrottleSpec
    The throttle specification class. Each server name is a different bin in this model.
